member.summary: The payment mode. Valid values: `postPay`: pay-as-you-go; `prePay`: prepaid; `riPay`: reserved instance; empty or `*`: all. If this parameter is empty or `*`, `productCode` and `subProductCode` must also be empty.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Billing.V20180709.Models.DescribeVoucherInfoRequest.PayScene
member.summary: If `PayMode` is `postPay`, this parameter may be `spotpay` (spot instance) or `settle account` (regular pay-as-you-go). If `PayMode` is `prePay`, this parameter may be `purchase`, `renew`, or `modify` (downgrade/upgrade). If `PayMode` is `riPay`, this parameter may be `oneOffFee` (prepayment of reserved instance) or `hourlyFee` (hourly billing of reserved instance). `*` means to query vouchers that support all billing scenarios.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Billing.V20180709.Models.VoucherInfos.PayScene
member.summary: If `PayMode` is `postPay`, this parameter may be `spotpay` (spot instance) or `settle account` (regular pay-as-you-go). If `PayMode` is `prePay`, this parameter may be `purchase`, `renew`, or `modify` (downgrade/upgrade). If `PayMode` is `riPay`, this parameter may be `oneOffFee` (prepayment of reserved instance) or `hourlyFee` (hourly billing of reserved instance). `*` means to query vouchers that support all billing scenarios.
